specs.title: accessing /es/campus without auth redirects to login
accessing a protected route without auth redirects to login
/en/login renders form in English
clicking a package redirects to Stripe checkout
successfully submits the lead capture form
shows an error if privacy policy is not checked
1.1.A: Ir a /login, cambiar a register, rellenar email+password de alumno nuevo
1.3.A y B: Recuperar contraseña muestra formulario y envía email

specs.title: classes page loads without errors
classes page shows "Próximas" tab
classes page shows "Historial" tab
clicking "Historial" tab switches the view
cancel button opens a confirmation modal with "Volver" option
dashboard page loads and shows a heading
campus page shows "Panel de control" heading
navigation link to "Mis clases" is visible
navigation link to "Mi cuenta" is visible
clicking "Mis clases" link navigates to /campus/classes
campus page does not show teacher-specific routes to students
4.1.A y 4.1.B: Hora de la clase cambia según timezone
4.2.A: Botón Join Meet estado (Futuro vs Inminente)
teacher calendar page loads and shows the current week
previous week navigation button is visible and clickable
next week navigation button is visible and clickable
"Programar clase" button is visible
clicking "Programar clase" opens the schedule modal
"Disponibilidad" tab is visible on the calendar page
availability section is accessible from the teacher campus area

suites.title: Fase 5 y 6 UAT: Sesiones - Cancelar, No-Show, Reporte

specs.title: 5.1.A y 5.1.B: Alumno puede cancelar clase
6.1.A a 6.2.E: Profesor completa clase y envía reporte
admin can access /es/campus/admin
admin dashboard shows a heading or panel title
students list page is accessible at /es/campus/admin/students
students list shows table rows with student data
admin can navigate to student detail from the students list
admin sees different navigation than student

suites.title: Fase 2 y 3 UAT: Agendamiento de Clases (Admin)

specs.title: 2.1.A a 2.1.C: Agendar clase individual desde modal
3.1.A a 3.2.B: Agendamiento masivo (Bulk Scheduler)
